duties_responsibilities.duty: Follow-up all purchased parts to ensure shipment and on-time delivery performance.
Serve as main point of contact for all suppliers and provide direction regarding ship schedule requirements.
Track critical parts, develop/execute containment plans to ensure no interruptions to manufacturing line.
Coordinate/arrange for alternative sources of material and requests for spot buys if necessary.
Independent monitoring, set-up, and cancellation of truck loads for material pick-up to support schedule variations.
Review part buffers to ensure they cover build requirements.
Document and manage S and AV code exceptions including Alarm Interval maintenance.
MGO Data Maintenance to maintain accurate inventory levels, making appropriate adjustments where necessary.
Investigate and process any record adjustment requests from the previous shift.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree preferred, H.S. diploma/GED required
